definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The incident took place at one of Beijing's most well-known shopping areas.
sentences.chinese: 此次事故發生在北京一個最著名的商業區。

sentences.english: The new trolleybus line was routed through the commercial district.
sentences.chinese: 新的無軌電車路線規定要通過商業區。

sentences.english: Gong Tian is located at No. 41 Shanggu Business Center on Tianta Road in Nankai District.
sentences.chinese: 宮田，位於南開區天塔路41號上谷商業區。

sentences.english: Housing and diverse businesses are located near the CBD.
sentences.chinese: 住宅和各種企業都在中心商業區附近。

sentences.english: He had to go up to Town that morning on Forsyte affairs.
sentences.chinese: 那天早上他得到商業區去辦點福爾賽家的財產事務。

sentences.english: Here is the old Beijing has one of the three major commercial district, at the Sheng-ming.
sentences.chinese: 這裏曾是老北京三大商業區之一，始於明盛於清。

sentences.english: This newspaper circulates mostly in the commercial districts.
sentences.chinese: 這份報紙大部分在商業區內銷售。

sentences.english: Do you want to know the promotion actions of our commerical tenants?
sentences.chinese: 你想知道商業區租戶的最新優惠活動嗎？

sentences.english: The underpinning area lies in the most flourish shopping center in the east of Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 該託換工區位於深圳市最繁華的東門商業區。

sentences.english: One of the city's bigg - est shopping areas is near here.
sentences.chinese: 本市最大的商業區之一就在附近。

sentences.english: "Metropolitan Mixer" islocated in SOLANA mall, chaoyang district Beijing.
sentences.chinese: “都市混合器”的樣本位於北京朝陽藍色港灣商業區。

sentences.english: Street was one of the north-bound arteries of the central business district.
sentences.chinese: 克拉倫斯街是中央商業區北段部分的主幹路之一。

sentences.english: No. 138 Minzu South Street, Heping District, Shenyang.
sentences.chinese: 坐落於瀋陽最繁華的太原街商業區南端。

sentences.english: To-morrow he would go into the roaring down-town district and find work.
sentences.chinese: 明天他要到熙熙攘攘的商業區去找事做。

sentences.english: A man uses a payphone in the new business district.
sentences.chinese: 一個男人在新的商業區打公用電話。

sentences.english: Many years ago, there weren't many fast-food restaurants in the business area.
sentences.chinese: 許多年前，那裏沒有很多快餐廳在這個商業區。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
